arStrings.szText: When you {c_important}{u}Freeze{/u}{/c} an enemy there is a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance they become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
{c_important}{u}Freezing{/u}{/c} an enemy has {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to make them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
